subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Track and Field
Drug Abuse and Traffic
Doping (Sports)
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The sprinter Justin Gatlin, the Olympic gold medal winner in the 100 meters in 2004, received a four-year ban in 2006 for drug violations.
snippet: The sprinter Justin Gatlin, the Olympic gold medal winner in the 100 meters in 2004, received a four-year ban in 2006 for drug violations.
